name: Machop
fact: Machop is known for its strength and often practices lifting heavy objects.

name: Machoke
fact: Machoke is incredibly strong and often trains by lifting large boulders.

name: Machamp
fact: Machamp has four muscular arms that it uses to deliver powerful punches.

name: Hitmonlee
fact: Hitmonlee's kicking power is so strong that it can kick down trees.

name: Hitmonchan
fact: Hitmonchan is skilled in various punching techniques and can strike with incredible speed.

name: Hitmontop
fact: Hitmontop's unique ability to spin on its head helps it in both offense and defense.

name: Combusken
fact: Combusken evolves from Torchic and can use powerful fire and fighting moves.

name: Blaziken
fact: Blaziken's fiery legs can deliver kicks with immense power, making it a fierce fighter.

name: Lucario
fact: Lucario can sense the auras of other living beings, which it uses to enhance its fighting techniques.

name: Gallade
fact: Gallade uses its psychic abilities to predict its opponent's moves and strike with precision.
